FuncDef: The display said-node status command displays the status of an SAID node. The display said-node status command displays the status of an SAID node.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies a CPU ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
